parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma2 </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> global</value></part><part><name>Multiplayer Arguments</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> global</value></part><part><name>Multiplayer Effects</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Groups </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Joins the unit to the given group, if position id is available, this one is used.  </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> unit '''joinAs''' [group, id] </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> unit: [[Object]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> [group, id]: [[Array]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER2</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> group: [[Group]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER3</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name>p4</name>=<value> id: [[Number]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER4</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value> 


</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[player]] [[joinAs]] [_group, 4];</code></value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> To get the position id: <code>getUnitPositionId = {
	[[private]] ["_vvn", "_str"];
	_vvn = [[vehicleVarName]] _this;
	_this [[setVehicleVarName]] "";
	_str = [[str]] _this;
	_this [[setVehicleVarName]] _vvn;
	[[parseNumber]] (_str [[select]] [(_str [[find]] ":") + 1])
};
[[player]] [[joinAs]] [<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/></ext>[[createGroup]] [[west]], 5];
_id = [[player]] [[call]] getUnitPositionId;
[[hint]] [[str]] _id; //5</code></value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE2</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[join]], [[joinAsSilent]], [[joinSilent]], [[group]] </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name index="7"/><value>  </value></part><part><name>MPBEHAVIOUR</name>=<value> 
____________________________________________________________________________________________
</value></part></template>
